--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Sunhawk got to the base.  He scanned it and saw both the Preds had 
> escaped.  He managed to manuever in flight mode through the halls 
> (knocking minimul stuff over of course) 4 or 5 times faster than 
> running.  He landed and transformed right in front of them.
> 
> Sunhawk:  If you wanted a drink of energon you could have just 
> asked.  Now on the tables both of you.  I intend to make sure 
you're 
> both properly restrained this time.
> 
> He draws him energon sword and holds it at close distance before 
they 
> have time to draw they're weapons so they'll get slashed if they do.
> 
Inferno creeped along the roof in his beast mode, it had taken some 
time for his beast form to heal him and he had followed Drillbit out 
of the brige "Inferno Terrorize" He exclaimed and landed on the floor 
in robot mode and drew his weapon "your power is useless against the 
royalty"
